mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P_CLIENT_APP_AUTH_CONFIG( app_id, app_name, app_key, app_type, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.app_id appId, a.app_name appName, a.app_key appKey, a.app_type appType, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime FROM P_CLIENT_APP_AUTH_CONFIG a WHERE a.app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
